title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-5.10 - Condensate level control
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-5.10 - Condensate level control

State Regulations

Each condensate return tank, where practicable, shall be
provided with an automatic water level control set to maintain the water level
within the limits of the gage glass. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-5.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
